item.title: InfoBeans Technologies Hits New 52-Week High of Rs.799.85
item.description: InfoBeans Technologies, a key player in the Computers - Software & Consulting sector, reached a significant milestone today by touching a new 52-week high of Rs.799.85. This achievement marks a notable moment in the stock’s performance, reflecting sustained momentum over the past year. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Dev Information Technology Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Dev Information Technology has reached a new 52-week low, with its stock price touching an intraday low of ₹35.44, just 1.43% above its lowest level of ₹35.26 over the past year. This marks a significant point in the stock’s performance as it continues to trade below all major moving averages, reflecting ongoing pressures within the Computers - Software & Consulting sector. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Sensex and Nifty Slip Amid Mixed Sector Performance; Punjab National Bank and Indraprastha Gas Lead Gains
item.description: The Indian equity markets witnessed a subdued session on 17 Dec 2025, with the Sensex and Nifty marginally lower as sectoral divergences and weak breadth weighed on investor sentiment. While select large caps such as Punjab National Bank and Indraprastha Gas recorded gains, broader indices including mid and small caps faced selling pressure amid cautious foreign institutional investor activity and mixed global cues. Time: 2 hours ago
